alert.note: Alert for Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area; Eastern Baranof Island and Southern Admiralty Island; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Misty Fjords; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 07 at 7:10AM AKDT until May 07 at 8:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 29 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Portions of Alaska. * WHEN...Until 8 AM AKDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northern Panhandle is more likely to have temperatures fall below freezing. Southern Panhandle will have lows possibly lowering to near freezing tonight.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
